Описание:
I was making this thing, then I realized I didn’t want to make it after all, so I quit. I was going to dispose of it but on the way to disposal I stuck it on this nail outside my studio and this may be the best it’s ever looked.
.
.
.
#glass #borosilicate #flameworking #gothicarchitecture #knowwhentoquit #failure

Experimental Argentine artist based in Barcelona. “My work focuses on flame-working with blown glass, exploring a non-existent dreamlike world based on dreams and the creation of other realities. Through innovative techniques and a multidisciplinary approach, I aim to challenge conventions and offer a profound reflection on identity and diversity. My pieces not only highlight the fragility of the material but also evoke a sense of resilience and connection to the multiple realities that coexist within our experience.”

-PIA GLASSWORKS
